name: Sniper Survival Hitman - Sooting Game
description:
"Get ready to take down high profile targets and complete assassination missions as the country’s finest sniper hitman. The country has been plagued by the terrorism spread by notorious mafia gang and you have been tasked with taking down the mafia bosses to uproot the hold of these gangs on the city.
Specialized elite hitman contracts throughout the city get players to bring out their best killer skills in this sniper fps simulator. Play through numerous contract kill challenges, targeting major and secondary targets to complete each level in the best time possible, and with as much accuracy as possible. Stake out each target with the eye of a true hunter and strike at the perfect time to rank high in this sniper contest.
FEATURES
Detailed contract killer missions
Play in 7 challenging contract kills, more to follow soon
Collect money kits to increasing earnings per kill
Grab health kits to regain control of each contract kill, if things go southways
TARGET LOCATIONS TO CHALLENGE THE REAL SNIPER HITMAN
Venture into different environments with different variables to test your killer instincts. Stake out the environments and take all variables and target behavior into account.
"
